sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT MAX(LasteTriggerDateTime) AS LasteTriggerDateTime FROM Audit.ADFRetailCustomerWatermark WITH(NOLOCK)

UPDATE Audit.ADFRetailCustomerWatermark SET LasteTriggerDateTime='@{formatDateTime(variables('ToDateTime'),'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss')}';
select 1 as success;
